unittitle_ssm: Sender Garlin Letters to Gil Green
abstract_ssm: Sender Garlin (1902-1999) was an author and journalist. This collection consists of letters Sender Garlin wrote between 1980-1987 to Gil Green (1906-1997) a longtime leading member of the Communist Party USA, and at that time, the unofficial leader of its reformist wing.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Communist Party of the United States of America
collection_ssm: Sender Garlin Letters to Gil Green
heading_ssm: Sender Garlin Letters to Gil Green
